name: Resonar
0:
”Alexa, turn on dining room lights”
”Alexa, turn on the fan”
”Alexa, turn of lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can use the skill to control Resonar smart devices in your house. Resonar Automation could control your electric switches at home.

There's no need to go to the switchboard to turn on/off your devices - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo.
After connecting Alexa to your Resonar smart products in a few simple steps:
(1). Download our "Resonar" android app from the PlayStore.
(2). Register one Resonar Automation account in our "Resonar" app.
(3). You need to have some Resonar smart devices in hand.
(4). Configure these devices in our Resonar app and change the appropriate name for your devices which will be used in the "Resonar" skill.
(5). Download Amazon "Alexa" app from Android, iOS respective app market.
(6). Configure Echo with "Alexa" app.

Then you can enable your skill using the following steps：
(1). Search "Resonar" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category;
(2). Click Enable skill of "Resonar", and you'll be navigated to the login page;
(3). Login with your Amazon account and allow the necessary permissions required, you'll be redirected to the success page;

Now all setup is finished. You can say:

"Alexa, turn on bedroom light"
"Alexa, turn off bedroom light"
"Alexa, turn on diningroom fan"
